author: Paul Rankin
method: Preheat the oven to 200C/400F/Gas 6. Score the mango flesh in a criss-cross pattern down to the skin. Push up against the skin to invert the mango so that the  flesh sticks out in cubes like a hedgehog. Place the mango 'hedgehog' onto a baking tray and scatter over the remaining ingredients.  Bake the mango on the baking tray in the preheated oven for 4-5 minutes and serve immediately.
ingredients: ½ mango, cut off the stone in one piece,  pinch dried chilli flakes,  1 tsp light brown sugar,  ½ lime, juice only
